display_name:
[Furious Final Battle in the Future] Super Saiyan God SS Goku + 
Super Saiyan God SS Vegeta

kit.leader_skill: "Future Saga" or "Fused Fighters" Category Ki +3, HP +200% and ATK & DEF +170%, plus an additional HP, ATK & DEF +50% for characters who also belong to the "Bond of Parent and Child" or "Final Trump Card" Category

super_attack.name: True and Utter Rage
super_attack.effect: Greatly raises ATK and raises DEF for 1 turn; Causes colossal damage to enemy; Lowers ATK

ultra_super_attack.name: Kamehameha
ultra_super_attack.effect: Greatly raises ATK; Causes mega-colossal damage to enemy; Raises allies' DEF by 60% for 1 turn (self excluded)

passive_skill.name: Significance of Combat Experience
passive_skill.effect: (Forever) ATK & DEF 200% up; (Forever) Receives an additional Ki +2 per Ki Sphere obtained; Per Super Class ally or "Future Saga" Category ally on the team (depending on which has more members): ATK & DEF 50% up (up to 150%); Chance of evading enemy's attack & damage reduction rate 20% up (up to 60%); When all allies attacking in the same turn are Super Class characters, or when there is another "Future Saga" Category ally attacking in the same turn: Launches an additional Super Attack; Chance of evading enemy's attack 20% up; Damage reduction rate 10% up; When activating the Active Skill or when attacking with 18 or more Ki: ATK 200% up; Attacks are effective against all Types; When receiving an attack: DEF 180% up

lines.text: Receives an additional Ki +2 per Ki Sphere obtained

lines.context: Per Super Class ally or "Future Saga" Category ally on the team (depending on which has more members)

lines.text: Chance of evading enemy's attack & damage reduction rate 20% up (up to 60%)
lines.context: Per Super Class ally or "Future Saga" Category ally on the team (depending on which has more members)

active_skill.name: Potara Counterattack
active_skill.effect: Raises ATK by 300% temporarily and; causes ultimate damage to enemy;; ATK & DEF +20%; Can nullify attacks; that are guaranteed to hit, making it; possible to evade these attacks, in battle
active_skill.activation_conditions: Can be activated starting from the 4th turn from the start of battle (once only, be it before or after Reversible Exchange)
